welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kalamata, a charming city known for its stunning beaches, delicious olives, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kalamata Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Kalamata Airport offers premium services for business and first class passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting the network name and following the instructions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eleftherios Venizelos Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Eleftherios Venizelos Airport serves mainly international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.
